description:
Flying-saucer-worthy style comes easy in the Close Encounters hiking sock. So do massive peak bids, thanks to the smooth 1x1 ribbed cuff, performance fit, and climate-regulating merino wool for comfortable and dry trekking. Darn Tough can't guarantee you'll have a supernatural experience on the trail, but if you do, feel free to tell bigfoot Darn Tough are still working on those custom XXXXXL sizes.

  • Men's micro crew socks average 8.5 in. from heel to cuff - expect them to show about 6 in. above a low hiking shoe or just above a standard hiking boot
  • A performance fit means no slipping, no bunching, no blisters for peak hiking comfort
  • Merino Wool is at home on the trail, naturally moving moisture to keep feet fresh and dry in all weather
  • Our all-season weight, midweight socks thermoregulate to wrap feet in steady comfort when temperatures change
  • The “still” in Still Made in Vermont, USA is personal. Darn Tough knit all their socks at their Vermont based Mills
name: Darn Tough Close Encounters Midweight Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Unisex
